examples.example: 他真牛，凭借自己的努力取得了巨大的成功。

translate.english: He is really great and has achieved great success through his own efforts.

examples.example: 他是一个很牛的人，总是能轻松解决各种难题。

translate.english: He is a very awesome person and always can easily solve all kinds of difficult problems.

examples.example: 这位运动员真牛，多次打破世界纪录，为国争光。

translate.english: This athlete is really awesome, having broken the world record many times and bringing honor to the country.
